about_the_game:
Aki was an ordinary woman who lived an ordinary life – at least, until one day, when she was whisked away to the magical realm of Anthem by the cat-eared mage, Mina. Mina's beloved priestess, Luna, has gone missing - kidnapped by the wicked demon queen Fiore - and Mina is on a mission to find her, even if it means enlisting help from a hero from another world.

Unfortunately for Mina, however, Aki is no hero. She's just an office lady who happens to have a bit of experience with a kendo sword. All the same, Aki agrees to help, and they embark upon their quest alongside the fox-eared halberd wielder, Scarlet.

After impressing Scarlet's former mentor, Dulce, with their teamwork, the girls receive a key piece of information as to Luna's whereabouts. Together, they venture deep into the woods, to locate the demon queen's stonghold.

Will they be able to defeat the demon queen and rescue Luna once and for all, or will Fiore have a few tricks up her sleeves to subdue our valiant heroines?

Come what may, this visual novel promises to be a fun-filled adventure full of yuri romance!


Aki The heroine of this story. She was a salarywoman living in Tokyo, but Mina's magic summons her to the realm of Anthem.

Shy and a little self-conscious, Aki constantly worries that she isn't pulling her weight in the party. She's gotten a little more confident, however, and she's trying to be optimistic, even if she is about to face off against the demon queen!

Mina A haughty catgirl (though she prefers to be called a catwoman) mage graduated top of her class from the best magical university in the country.

A cosmopolitan girl who loves living in luxury, Mina isn't too stoked about the prospect of camping and roughing it out in the woods as she travels to rescue Luna. She's prepared to risk anything, however, for the sake of her beloved priestess.

Scarlet A cheerful warrior who's something of a tomboy, Scarlet is fiery and full of never-ending energy.

Scarlet isn't afraid at all of facing down against the demon queen. In fact, she's looking forward to giving Fiore a piece of her mind - and kicking her ass to boot. Aki's a little worried she's not taking this seriously, however...

Luna A beautiful priestess who spent all of her life living in seclusion in a temple in Anthem's capital city. She knows little of the outside world, and she's rather sheltered.

Mina used to work as Luna's dutiful bodyguard, and it was her job to keep Luna safe. Mina and Luna were very close, and Mina is terrified that something awful might have befallen her now she's been kidnapped by the demon queen.

Fiore Not a lot is known about Fiore other than the obvious fact that she's a demon. As a member of a hardy race known for living hundreds - if not, thousands - of years, nobody knows quite how old Fiore is, or even where she originated from.

Spoken of in hushed whispers for centuries as a wicked figure who burns down towns and brings destruction for her own amusement, she's a force to be reckoned with. What dastardly plans does she have with Luna, and does Aki have a hope of foiling them?


Features:
Sakura Isekai Adventure 3, is a visual novel with mostly linear story while a certain selection of choices can lead to different ways the story progresses and unlock certain artworks and scenes.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contain scenes or outfits people may perceive as NSFW.
